text: Inn mein say jissay tu chahaye door rakh day aur jissay chahaye apnay pass rakh ley aur agar tu unn mein say bhi kissi ko apnay pass bula ley jinhen tu ney alag ker rakha tha to tujh per koi gunah nahi iss mein iss baat ki ziyada tawakka hai kay inn aurton ki aankhen thandi rahen aur woh ranjeedah na hon aur jo kuch bhi tu enhen dey dey iss per sab ki sab razi rahen tumahray dilon mein jo kuch hai ussay Allah (khoob) janta hai. Allah Taalaa bara hi ilm aur hilm wala hai
